document.full_text: a federal judge ordered that jared l. loughner's medical records be sent to a psychologist who is evaluating his competency to stand trial in the january tucson shooting spree.
document.title: southwest: arizona: psychologist to evaluate medical records of massacre suspect
lines_and_colors: a federal judge ordered that jared l. loughner's medical records be sent to a psychologist who is evaluating his competency to stand trial in the january tucson shooting spree.
